author: USA TODAY, Adam Schiff, Bennie Thompson and Stephanie Murphy, Opinion contributors
title: Create Coronavirus Commission now to review pandemic response: Schiff, Thompson & Murphy
description: This is not an exercise in score-settling or finger-pointing. Only an objective, bipartisan examination of this pandemic will prepare us for the next.
content:
This is not an exercise in score-settling or finger-pointing. Only an objective, bipartisan examination of this pandemic will prepare us for the next.
The fight against coronavirus is unlike any our nation has waged in modern history. But this is not the fir… [+6412 chars]
